<title level="1" right="Hazard 8" pfs="">[Cave-In](/Hazards.aspx?ID=407)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Environmental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=62" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown](/Sources.aspx?ID=210) pg. 8, [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 6

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

The rubble shifts and the cavern ceiling collapses.

---

**Stealth**
DC 24 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 28 [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) (expert) or DC 31 [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) (trained) to prop up the cavern ceiling without triggering a collapse.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Collapse** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature moves the rubble; **Effect** The cavern collapses in a cave-in that deals 4d8+22 bludgeoning damage to the triggering creature and all creatures in the cavern (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
